title: WikiLeaks Asks President-Elect Trump to Pardon Julian Assange as Compensation?
subtitle: WikiLeaks has long sought relief from U.S. investigations and interference, and Julian Assange hasn't asked President-Elect Trump for a compensatory pardon.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Julian Assange asked President-Elect Donald Trump for a pardon in exchange for his help in defeating Hillary Clinton.
